descriptionProfile: A showcase of the vanguard and cutting-edge in mixology. Tag #MixologyGuide to get featured - Cheers!
A showcase of the vanguard and cutting-edge in mixology. Tag

posts.description:
Today's featured cocktail won first place @ IWCC Cremesso Group competition! @dominik_wolf_mixology_  created this complex work of art, highlighting several different exotic ingredients, techniques and a killer presentation! Congratulations and see recipe below:
1.5 oz  Tea siphon infused Forrest Fruit @stoli vodka 
3/4 oz @dekuypercocktails Lychee Kwai feh Liqueur 
1/2 oz @monin_usa green apple
1/2 oz lemon/lime juice
Garnish = edible paper, lychee, orange, physalis & beargrass!
Cheersüç∏üç∏MG

Today's featured cocktail comes to us from mixologist @petrovandco who is competing in the Chivas Masters UAE üá¶üá™ called "The Souk & Merchant"  See recipe below:
1.5 oz Chivas Regal 12yr
0.5 oz Date syrup
0.5 oz espresso
10 drops Green Cardamom Tincture 
5 Mint leaves
Shake and strain into a Turkish Coffee Pot over cubed ice, cover with crushed ice and garnish with mint, date and torched cardamom pods.
Cheers üç∏üç∏MG #mixologyguide

Today's cocktail of the day is inspired by üå≥ forests and all the wonderful herbs and flowers that can be found while taking a stroll through them to appreciate the upcoming spring thaw :  Negroni Alpino 
1.5 oz @stgeorgespirits #terroir  #gin 
3/4 oz @fernetbranca 
3/4 oz @giuliococchi #americano #aromatizedwine 
Stir in a beaker filled with ice
Strain over a large ice sphere in an old fashioned glass and garnish with a fresh mint sprig
Cheersüç∏üç∏MG
#mixologyguide #mixologyguidelab

Introducing "Le Planteur" from the brand new @lacommunepunchclub
.
Calvados - Sparking water - Lemon juice - Cucumber - Falernum (maceration of rhum and spices)
.
Thank you Romain for the warm hospitality!
.
Sant√©
#mixologyguide

*This amazing mixology lounge offers cocktails made only with ingredients from the south of France!*
.
Introducing "Le Sudiste" by @lesyndicat
.
Cedrat (special lemon from Corsica) eau de vie
Orange rosemary syrup
Lemon juice
Mauresque foam (blend of pastis and almond) .
Passion + Authenticity = Le Syndicat .
Sant√©
#mixologyguide

Introducing the "Autumn Leaves" by @jefreysbar 
Gin Brecon, Jus de granny Smith fraud, Jus de celeri frais, Tincture de cumin, Citron jaune, simple syrup, Blanc d'oeuf, and tonic.

Sant√©
#mixologyguide

Introducing the "Cherbourgeois" by the #experimentalcocktailclub in #Paris!
Home made orgeat syrup, celery juice, lemon juice, rittenhouse rye, peycheud biters, and creme de cassis 
Sant√©!
#mixologyguide
We are in #paris! Any #mixology bar recommendations? Cheers! #mixologyguide

Today's featured cocktail üçπ comes to us from @sminor83 and is a wonderful play on an old fashioned. The "Casks Abound" is a smooth marriage of aged rum, smokey scotch and Pedro ximenez sherry. See recipe below:
1.5 oz aged rum
1/2 oz @laphroaig 10 yr
1/2 oz spiced Pedro ximenez #sherry syrup
3 dashes aromatic Bitters 
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail beaker filled with ice and stir for 20 seconds. 
Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with an ice sphere & garnish with a clove studded orange peel
Cheers üç∏üç∏ MG

What's one of our #favorite #aperitif style drinks before a big dinner you ask? Try a #bamboococktail from @adenagrill. This low ABV, refreshing cocktail is the perfect choice, originally hailing from #yokohama üáØüáµ 1.5 oz @bodegaslustau #amontillado #sherry 
1.5 oz dolin #blancvermouth 
2 dashes @angosturahouse Bitters 
2 dashes orange üçä Bitters 
Stir in a cocktail beaker filled with ice for 30 seconds and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a üçã peel
Cheers üç∏üç∏MG
